short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to make it easy to visit mastodon profiles from your instance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a clickable mastodon icon next to mastodon style usernames (@indiealexh@tny.social) that directs you to your own mastodon instance for ease of following.
